text: Dallas Murray "Dal" Richards, CM, OBC (5 January 1918 - 31 December 2015) was a Canadian big band leader.Dal Richards, Vancouverâ€™s King of Swing, dies at 97 , vancouversun.com Richards led his band for many years in a weekly CBC Radio show broadcast nationally from the Panorama Roof Ballroom of the Hotel Vancouver. , Richards also hosts a weekly one-hour show on radio station CISL. Richards is commonly thought to be the lyricist of "Roar You Lions Roar", the fight song of the BC Lions football club set to the music of "I Love the Sunshine of Your Smile". ==References== Category:1918 births Category:2015 deaths Category:Bandleaders Category:Musicians from Vancouver
